<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Thread-safe allocator adaptor. Uses a spin lock on the assumption that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">/// contention here is extremely rare.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TODO: Using a spin lock on every allocation can be quite expensive when</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// contention is high. Since this is mainly used for BumpPtrAllocator and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// SpecificBumpPtrAllocator, it&#39;d be better to have a specific thread-safe</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BumpPtrAllocator implementation that only use a fair lock when allocating a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// new slab but otherwise using atomic and be lock-free.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadsafeallocator"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AllocatorType&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadsafeallocator">ThreadSafeAllocator</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">LockGuard &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal">    LockGuard(std::atomic&#95;flag &amp;Flag) : Flag(Flag) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a104cae72182bec0ab951e3faea6ce509">LLVM&#95;UNLIKELY</a>(Flag.test&#95;and&#95;set(std::memory&#95;order&#95;acquire)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Flag.test&#95;and&#95;set(std::memory&#95;order&#95;acquire)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
